name: Chantal Joffe
caption: deletable image-caption
awards: Delfina Studio Trust Award (1994–96),Abbey Scholarship (1998–99),Charles Wollaston Award (2006)
summary: Chantal Joffe  (born 5 October 1969) is an English artist based in London. Her often large-scale paintings generally depict women and children. In 2006, she received the prestigious Charles Wollaston Award from the Royal Academy.
